description.narrative: 204/002 By the end of 2014, national and international good practices in environmental education and climate change implemented, documented, shared and scaled up, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 204 All school girls and boys living in lagging woredas including in the DRS are demonstrating core learning competencies through the School Improvement Programme (SIP) as defined by the National Curriculum Standards System and measured by the National Learning Assessment for grade four by 2015
